name: The Great Elf Revolt
description:
The Great Elf Revolt

Created entirely in two weeks for the 32bit Holiday Jam 2021.

Download the game for best experience. But if you can't or don't want to, it should still run fine in the browser.

In this game you play as Santa, and pilot the sleigh through the air. The elves are tired of their poor working conditions and have decided to revolt! They have stolen all of the presents, and it's up to you to get them back and deliver them to their rightful homes. Just don't crash your sleigh!

How to Play

- Use the arrow keys, WASD, or the left joystick on a controller to steer the sleigh.

- Hold left-shift, right-shift, or any controller face button to slow down.

- Press ESC, or Start on a controller to pause the game.

Controller support may vary on different platforms. Xbox controllers should work on Windows.
